summary.para: Contains classes and interfaces specific to the Pivot Grid Module Windows Forms functionality.
Represents the pivot grid List Editor used in the XAF Windows Forms applications.

summary.para: Contains classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your WinForms application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Extends the interface with a method to add the Pivot Grid Module to your application.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Win.ApplicationBuilder.PivotGridApplicationBuilderExtensions.AddPivotGrid(DevExpress.ExpressApp.ApplicationBuilder.IModuleBuilder{DevExpress.ExpressApp.Win.ApplicationBuilder.IWinApplicationBuilder})

summary.para: Adds the Pivot Grid Module to your application.

member.param: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
member.returns: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
